landing.headline: Create Stunning Ads with
landing.subheadline: Generate professional ad content in minutes. From images to videos, let AI transform your marketing campaigns with just a few clicks.
landing.featuresSubtitle: Create ad content easily and quickly with AI technology
landing.gallerySubtitle: Explore amazing ad content created with AI by our users

hero.tagline: Create it yourself, no experts needed
hero.description: Images, videos, avatars. Create professional ads with just a few clicks.

workflow.title: Simple 3 Steps
workflow.subtitle: No complicated work. Just a few clicks and your ad is ready

imageSteps.step1Desc: Enter product image or URL. Background removal and resizing are handled automatically.
imageSteps.step2Desc: Select your desired ad style from recommendations. One click is all it takes.
imageSteps.step3Desc: Professional-quality ad images are generated. Download them right away.

videoSteps.step1Desc: Register your product and select an avatar. You can also create your own avatar from a single photo.
videoSteps.step2Desc: Enter your ad text. Natural voice and lip sync are generated automatically.
videoSteps.step3Desc: High-quality video with talking avatar is ready. Use it right away without editing.
